title: Bug 18285: Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
EB: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor should open on the unit hosting the import reference, not the target type.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the package view outline.
2. Double-click on a type import statement.
3. Observe that the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
